attributes.title: 0 stars
attributes.review: This app made gave me a bunch of viruses. After having this Trump 2020 app on my phone my battery now doesnt even last more than an hour. I can no longer connect to any Bluetooth devices. Half my apps wont even load. As well as a bunch of weird glitches constantly. I strongly regret downloading this horrid app and i hope for you that you dont make the same mistake i did. :(

attributes.title: App caused me to go blind and break my legs DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: When I opened the app I saw the face of some scary Oompa Loompa and he stared into my soul and then my eyes just disintegrated. Do not recommend I am now blind and after I was blinded I stood up and didn’t see where I was going so I fell off a cliff. Now both of my legs are broken. This app also had some other side effects like causing me to recite the shrek script over and over while having a seizure.

attributes.title: My cat exploded because of this app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see when my dinosaur would update. As soon as i opened it my fridge ran away when i went to go chase it i ran into my neighbor who then turned into my grandmother. When i confronted them about it they took my fridge. I went back home to warm up my burrito in the closet but my cat then exploded. Also very glitchy and my pet rino does not like the taste of it.

attributes.title: I will never be able to sleep again🙄
attributes.review: I opened the app to see a disgusting orange bug on my screen.🧑🏻‍🦲After that I went to sleep but I was awaken by something that looked like a used pad covered in moldy orange cum🤨And it told me to delete the app I think because I’m black🤷🏽‍♀️ I would 100% give this app no stars🤡but I did get to meet Finn Wolfhard who was surprisingly in hand cuffs behind that fat chetto puff I mentioned at the beginning👺

attributes.title: Stolen card information
attributes.review: After downloading this app, I started to notice several transactions on my debit card, all of which made as “donations” to the trump administration. My bank fought to get my $4000 back, but I didn’t realize that in the terms it showed that I had agreed to it (who reads those). I just bought a maga hat, I never wanted to donate $4000. Don’t download unless you want your money (and freedom, and peace of mind) stolen

attributes.title: The worst app I have ever downloaded
attributes.review: I must say, what did I expect. You put trump and anything together and it’s bound to be a one star rating. I opened the app and it immediately crashed, much like the economy under his failed corona virus response. The whole app was filled with gibberish, unfinished sentences, etc, which did add to authenticity as 99% of his speeches sound similar. This man can’t even run an app, how could he run our country?

attributes.title: Traumatizing 😳🤢
attributes.review: Just even opening the app first thing I saw trump putting people in cages!!! CAGES! How vile and disgusting of a orange Cheeto wearing a blonde wig to do! It’s wrong and inhuman!!! I’m so angry with this app and this man I would give a lower rating 😤😤I went through more of the app which I should have NOT done because it was him preying on young kids 🤮 my eyes BURN and I can’t even imagine how his own children feel! I’m forever traumatized and I need therapy from this app!

attributes.title: this app stole MY PUPPY (no star)
attributes.review: i opened this app to supper my lovely country and it CRASHED (not cool) when it came back on you’ll never guess what happened..THEY STOLE MY PUPPY..they said my puppy just wasn’t orange enough to support the man himself and said i’ll have to just carry around a soggy self tanner bottle on a leash..my doggo is gone not to mention now everytime i open my phone i get ptsd from the app crashing and turing my screen BRIGHT orange.. do not recommend..ZERO STARS 🤦🏼‍♀️😤

attributes.title: Horrible absolutely horrible
attributes.review: That’s all I have to say about this app I open it and all I see a spinning t that’s about to give me an aneurysm, then to top it off I almost had a heart attack bc a random clown popped up on the screen telling me to enter my phone # 😭😳 let me just say at that moment I felt forced to do things I didn’t want to bc it only gave me one choice I couldn’t even explore the monstrosity that awaited

attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN!😡😡🤬🤬🤬
attributes.review: I AM DISGUSTED! When opening the app i was immediately splashed in the face with CHEETOH DUST and i accidentally breathed it in! I had to go to the hospital cus i was dying and the hospital bill was ENORMOUS! But then an angel came from above, Bernie❤️. He gave me free healthcare and now im not homeless. When i got home i went to delete the app and it was HYPNOTIZING ME!!! It told me to join the cult and to never respect anyone that isnt a white man! I BROKE FREE because i am stronger than that. NEVER GET THIS APP YOU WILL BE HYPNOTIZED! 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡
